verses.verse: Then <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> and <S%H1301>Barak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H42>Abinoam<s%> <S%H7891>sang<s%> on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
"Because the leaders took the <S%H6544>lead<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> because the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5068>offered<s%> themselves <S%H1288>willingly,<s%> be blessed, <S%H3068>Yahweh!<s%>

<S%H8085>"Hear,<s%> you <S%H4428>kings!<s%> Give <S%H238>ear,<s%> you <S%H7336>princes!<s%> <S%H7891>I,<s%> even I, will sing to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> praise to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3068>"Yahweh,<s%> when you went <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> when you marched <S%H6805>out<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7493>trembled,<s%> the <S%H8064>sky<s%> also <S%H5197>dropped.<s%> <S%H5645>Yes,<s%> the clouds <S%H5197>dropped<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H5140>quaked<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> even <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"In the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8044>Shamgar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6067>Anath,<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3278>Jael,<s%> the <S%H734>highways<s%> were <S%H2308>unoccupied.<s%> The <S%H1980>travelers<s%> <S%H3212>walked<s%> through <S%H6128>byways.<s%>

The <S%H6520>rulers<s%> <S%H2308>ceased<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> They <S%H2308>ceased<s%> until <S%H1683>I,<s%> Deborah, <S%H6965>arose;<s%> Until I <S%H6965>arose<s%> a <S%H517>mother<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

They <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%> Then <S%H3901>war<s%> was in the <S%H8179>gates.<s%> Was there a <S%H4043>shield<s%> or <S%H7420>spear<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> among <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>
My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is toward the <S%H2710>governors<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who offered themselves <S%H5068>willingly<s%> among the <S%H5971>people.<s%> <S%H1288>Bless<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh!<s%>
<S%H7878>"Speak,<s%> you who <S%H7392>ride<s%> on <S%H6715>white<s%> <S%H860>donkeys,<s%> you who <S%H3427>sit<s%> on rich <S%H4055>carpets,<s%> and you who <S%H1980>walk<s%> by the <S%H1870>way.<s%>

Far from the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of <S%H2686>archers,<s%> in the places of drawing <S%H4857>water,<s%> there they will <S%H8567>rehearse<s%> the righteous <S%H6666>acts<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the righteous <S%H6666>acts<s%> of his <S%H6520>rule<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> "Then the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H8179>gates.<s%>

<S%H5782><s%> 'Awake, <S%H5782>awake,<s%> <S%H1683>Deborah!<s%> <S%H5782>Awake,<s%> <S%H5782>awake,<s%> <S%H1696>utter<s%> a <S%H7892>song!<s%> <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H1301>Barak,<s%> and lead away <S%H7628>your<s%> <S%H7617>captives,<s%> you <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H42>Abinoam.<s%>'
"Then a <S%H8300>remnant<s%> of the <S%H117>nobles<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> came <S%H3068>down.<s%> Yahweh came down for me <S%H7287>against<s%> the <S%H1368>mighty.<s%>

Those whose <S%H8328>root<s%> is in <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> came out of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1144>you,<s%> Benjamin, among your <S%H5971>peoples.<s%> <S%H2710>Governors<s%> come <S%H3381>down<s%> out of <S%H4353>Machir.<s%> Those who <S%H4900>handle<s%> the <S%H5608>marshal<s%>'s <S%H7626>staff<s%> came out of <S%H2074>Zebulun.<s%>

The <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> were with <S%H1683>Deborah.<s%> As was <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> so was <S%H1301>Barak.<s%> They <S%H7971>rushed<s%> into the <S%H6010>valley<s%> at his <S%H7272>feet.<s%> By the <S%H6390>watercourses<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> there were <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2711>resolves<s%> of <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

Why did you <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H4942>sheepfolds,<s%> To <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H8292>whistling<s%> for the <S%H5739>flocks?<s%> At the <S%H6390>watercourses<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> There were <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2714>searchings<s%> of <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

<S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H7931>lived<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%> Why did <S%H1835>Dan<s%> <S%H1481>remain<s%> in <S%H591>ships?<s%> <S%H836>Asher<s%> sat <S%H3427>still<s%> at the <S%H2348>haven<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and <S%H7931>lived<s%> by his <S%H4664>creeks.<s%>

<S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> was a <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H2778>jeopardized<s%> their <S%H5315>lives<s%> to the <S%H4191>deaths;<s%> <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> <S%H4791>also,<s%> on the high places of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

"The <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3898>fought,<s%> then the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> at <S%H8590>Taanach<s%> by the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4023>Megiddo.<s%> They <S%H3947>took<s%> no <S%H1215>plunder<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>
From the <S%H8064>sky<s%> the <S%H3556>stars<s%> <S%H3898>fought.<s%> From their <S%H4546>courses,<s%> they <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H5516>Sisera.<s%>

The <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H7028>Kishon<s%> swept them <S%H1640>away,<s%> that <S%H6917>ancient<s%> <S%H5158>river,<s%> the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H7028>Kishon.<s%> My <S%H5315>soul,<s%> march <S%H1869>on<s%> with <S%H5797>strength.<s%>
Then the horse <S%H6119>hoofs<s%> <S%H1986>stamped<s%> because of the <S%H1726>prancings,<s%> the <S%H1726>prancings<s%> of their strong <S%H47>ones.<s%>

<S%H779><s%> 'Curse <S%H4789>Meroz,<s%>' <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H779><s%> 'Curse <S%H779>bitterly<s%> its <S%H3427>inhabitants,<s%> because they <S%H935>didn't<s%> come to <S%H5833>help<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to <S%H5833>help<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> against the <S%H1368>mighty.<s%>'

<S%H3278>"Jael<s%> shall be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> above <S%H802>women,<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H2268>Heber<s%> the <S%H7017>Kenite;<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> shall she be above <S%H802>women<s%> in the <S%H168>tent.<s%>
He <S%H7592>asked<s%> for <S%H4325>water.<s%> She <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H2461>milk.<s%> She brought <S%H7126>him<s%> <S%H2529>butter<s%> in a <S%H117>lordly<s%> <S%H5602>dish.<s%>

She <S%H7971>put<s%> her <S%H3027>hand<s%> to the tent <S%H3489>peg,<s%> and her right <S%H3225>hand<s%> to the <S%H6001>workmen<s%>'s <S%H1989>hammer.<s%> With the hammer she <S%H1986>struck<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera.<s%> She struck <S%H4277>through<s%> his <S%H7218>head.<s%> <S%H4272>Yes,<s%> she pierced and struck <S%H2498>through<s%> his <S%H7541>temples.<s%>

At her <S%H7272>feet<s%> he <S%H3766>bowed,<s%> he <S%H5307>fell,<s%> he <S%H7901>lay.<s%> At her <S%H7272>feet<s%> he <S%H3766>bowed,<s%> he <S%H5307>fell.<s%> <S%H834>Where<s%> he <S%H3766>bowed,<s%> there he fell <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H7703>dead.<s%>

"Through the <S%H2474>window<s%> she <S%H8259>looked<s%> <S%H2980>out,<s%> and cried: <S%H5516>Sisera<s%>'s <S%H517>mother<s%> looked through the <S%H822>lattice.<s%> <S%H7393><s%> 'Why is his chariot so <S%H954>long<s%> in <S%H935>coming?<s%> Why do the <S%H6471>wheels<s%> of his <S%H4818>chariots<s%> <S%H309>wait?<s%>'
Her <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H8282>ladies<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H7725>her,<s%> Yes, she returned answer to <S%H561>herself,<s%>

<S%H4672><s%> 'Have they not found, have they not <S%H2505>divided<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil?<s%> A <S%H7356>lady,<s%> <S%H7361>two<s%> ladies to <S%H7218>every<s%> <S%H1397>man;<s%> to <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> a <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of <S%H6648>dyed<s%> <S%H7998>garments,<s%> a spoil of <S%H6648>dyed<s%> garments <S%H7553>embroidered,<s%> of <S%H6648>dyed<s%> garments embroidered on both <S%H7553>sides,<s%> on the <S%H6677>necks<s%> of the <S%H7998>spoil?<s%>'

"So let all your <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H6>perish,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> but let those who <S%H157>love<s%> him be as the <S%H8121>sun<s%> when it rises <S%H3318>forth<s%> in its <S%H1369>strength.<s%>" Then the <S%H776>land<s%> had <S%H8252>rest<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
